alert.note: Alert for Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Ulster; Western Dutchess (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Dutchess County through 400 PM EDT... At 315 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Beacon. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, pea size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roads and in urban and poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Poughkeepsie, Beacon, Wappingers Falls, Fishkill, Hopewell Junction, Marlboro, Red Oaks Mill, Myers Corner, East Fishkill, Beekman, Stormville, Knapps Corner, Swartoutville, Brockway, Green Haven, Titusville, New Hamburg, Glenham, Crown Heights and Beacon Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Ulster; Western Dutchess
